parameter.label: Run legality checking
parameter.tooltip: Option to run only legality checking on the current netlist. Analysis and synthesis must be run successfully before you use this option.

parameter.label: Placement effort
parameter.tooltip: Option to specify the level of effor you want the Fitter to use

parameter.label: Incremental SignalTap
parameter.tooltip: Option to perform an incremental SignalTap(R) II compilation. Use this option when only SignalTap settings have changed since the last compilation

parameter.label: Placement effort multiplier
parameter.tooltip: Option to specify a value for the loop multiplier used during placement. Use of a higher value increases compilation time, but may increase the quality of placement

parameter.label: Lower priority
parameter.tooltip: Option to lower priority of the current process.

parameter.label: One fit attempt
parameter.tooltip: Option to perform only one fitting attempt, giving a no fit if that attempt fails. When this option is turned off, the fitter may perform additional attemps

parameter.label: Optimize IO registers
parameter.tooltip: Option to optimize I/O register placement for timing. This option is used for timing-driven compilation

parameter.label: Pack registers
parameter.tooltip: Option to implement register packing for appropriate pairs of registers and logic functions

parameter.label: # of processors to use
parameter.tooltip: Controls parallel compilation. If 0 is specified, the Quartus software uses all processors detected on the system. Otherwise, the software attempts to use the specified number of processors. Note: this feature is not licenced for the Web Edition and this parameter should be set to 1

parameter.label: Part (see Project)
parameter.tooltip: Altera device to use (configured in 'project' dialog)

parameter.label: Plan
parameter.tooltip: This flow will place all periphery elements (such as IOs and PLLs) and determine a legal clock plan. No core placement or routing will be performed

parameter.label: Rapid recompile
parameter.tooltip: Option to run Quartus Fit in Rapid Recompile mode

parameter.label: Seed
parameter.tooltip: Option to use the specified seed value. The Fitter uses this value as the initial placement configuration when attempting to optimize the design timing requirements, including fmax

parameter.label: Timing-driven compilation
parameter.tooltip: Option to use timing-driven compilation. This option optimizes place and route based on timing information
